I'm Chris, I always wondered what it'd be like to drive strangers as a taxi driver, so I signed up to drive for Uber, Lyft and Sidecar in San Francisco. 
10,000 Rides is my illustrated journal of the most interesting comments, conversations and characters I encountered along the way. (Read Samples). 
My dear friend, Scott, spent 200+ hours illustrating my wildest experiences! (View the Illustrations on instagram)
Christopher Lin and Scott Tuckfield
This collectible book doubles as a beautiful coffee table book and a trusted "sit on the john" companion. 
I don't recommend reading these stories to your kids, unless you want them having nightmares about the complexities of the human kind. I have omitted all the original names to protect the privacy of my passengers.

updates.update_content:
All books are shipped. My car was totaled on the way home after picking up the car after being rear ended by an El Camino....it's a fitting end to a crazy journey. My beloved Prius named Mojito is now dead.
If you need a tracking number, please text or email me, and I'll send one.
Sorry for the delay, enjoy your books friends! Thanks for making my project possible!

updates.update_userinfo: Thanks for your patience, it's been a long road...
updates.update_content:
Books are shipping to my house on June 28th, and I'll ship within 2 business days of receiving them.
Cheers everyone, and thank you for your patience.

updates.update_userinfo: Holy crap! Finally! Books ship June 1st!
updates.update_content:
Finally the proofs have been approved. It took me 3 printers to finally find one that could do a good job on the illustrations! I just approved the final draft and the printing and shipping will occur this month.
Please update your address to where you will be the first week of June!
Thanks for your patience!
Sorry for the delay guys. I'm still waiting for the books. I ordered them from the states and should get another update on Monday. Thanks for your patience �

Just updating you guys. I'm using a US printer, and it takes between 3-6 weeks for the printing to finish. I'll update you guys as soon as the books arrive, I plan on staying up all night to ship them all the next day. I'm excited! 
The Printer recommended I change the name of the book to something like Uber/Lyft Diaries, so it's more specific, It'll be 10,000 Rides for your enjoyment, but I may change it before it goes on Amazon.

Good Day Kickstarter Backers!
Thank you for your patience!  10,000 Rides is now available to download and read in ePub, mobi or pdf format. Please be patient if you're opening it on your phone or computer, there are 54 high quality images that take a few minutes to render.
You should have received one email from nychrislin@gmail.com with a link to download the file from Google Drive.  Check your spam folder, just in case!
